name: io.github.ChiR24/unreal-engine-mcp
description: MCP server for Unreal Engine 5 with 17 tools for game development automation.

environmentVariables.name: LOG_LEVEL
environmentVariables.description: Logging level: debug, info, warn, error (default: info)

environmentVariables.name: MCP_ROUTE_STDOUT_LOGS
environmentVariables.description: Route standard output to standard error to avoid protocol corruption (default: true)

environmentVariables.name: UE_PROJECT_PATH
environmentVariables.description: Absolute path to your Unreal .uproject file

environmentVariables.name: MCP_AUTOMATION_HOST
environmentVariables.description: Automation bridge WebSocket host (default: 127.0.0.1). Set to 0.0.0.0 for LAN access (requires MCP_AUTOMATION_ALLOW_NON_LOOPBACK=true)

environmentVariables.name: MCP_AUTOMATION_ALLOW_NON_LOOPBACK
environmentVariables.description: SECURITY: Allow binding to non-loopback addresses (e.g., 0.0.0.0) for LAN access. Only enable if you understand the security implications. (default: false)

environmentVariables.name: MCP_AUTOMATION_CLIENT_MODE
environmentVariables.description: Run as client connecting to UE (false) or server listening for UE (true) (default: false)

environmentVariables.name: MCP_AUTOMATION_USE_TLS
environmentVariables.description: Use wss:// for the automation bridge client connection (default: false)

environmentVariables.name: MCP_AUTOMATION_MAX_MESSAGES_PER_MINUTE
environmentVariables.description: Max inbound automation bridge messages per minute before disconnect (default: 600)

environmentVariables.name: MCP_AUTOMATION_MAX_AUTOMATION_REQUESTS_PER_MINUTE
environmentVariables.description: Max inbound automation request messages per minute before disconnect (default: 120)

author: ChiR24
